issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: In Amazon when you use an incorrect statistic name the following is returned, in this example MAX instead of Maximum: {code} In [140]: aws_metric.query(start, end, 'MAX') send: 'GET /?AWSAccessKeyId=AKIAJTSHR3GPTBCT4C3A&Action=GetMetricStatistics&EndTime=2013-02-20T20%3A03%3A57.053275&MetricName=Metric-1361389832&Namespace=Namespace-1361389832&Period=60&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&StartTime=2013-02-19T20%3A03%3A57.053275&Statistics.member.1=MAX&Timestamp=2013-02-20T22%3A15%3A14Z&Version=2010-08-01&Signature=sAu2%2B4ahcmZLh8zWqwvjF7BiIjOnYDlik3wDx2piHVc%3D HTTP/1.1\r\nHost: monitoring.us-west-1.amazonaws.com\r\nAccept-Encoding: identity\r\nContent-Length: 0\r\nUser-Agent: Boto/2.5.2 (darwin)\r\n\r\n' reply: 'HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request\r\n' header: x-amzn-RequestId: fcf668c3-7baa-11e2-882c-3fa8466dc4a3 header: Content-Type: text/xml header: Content-Length: 366 header: Date: Wed, 20 Feb 2013 22:15:09 GMT --------------------------------------------------------------------------- BotoServerError: BotoServerError: 400 Bad Request Sender InvalidParameterValue The parameter Statistics.member.1 must be a value in the set [Sum, Maximum, Minimum, SampleCount, Average]. fcf668c3-7baa-11e2-882c-3fa8466dc4a3 {code} We happily return null values: {code} In [141]: euca_metric.query(start, end, 'MAX') send: 'GET /services/CloudWatch/?AWSAccessKeyId=LKGBQ5SJAYKWK1RQFUFCE&Action=GetMetricStatistics&EndTime=2013-02-20T20%3A03%3A57.053275&MetricName=Metric-1361380222&Namespace=Namespace-1361380222&Period=60&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&StartTime=2013-02-19T20%3A03%3A57.053275&Statistics.member.1=MAX&Timestamp=2013-02-20T22%3A21%3A43Z&Version=2010-08-01&Signature=DfNGrxtav9f0FHhdcqn8Pjk3REsfADJcXlkO57ouWSw%3D HTTP/1.1\r\nHost: 10.111.1.61:8773\r\nAccept-Encoding: identity\r\nContent-Length: 0\r\nUser-Agent: Boto/2.5.2 (darwin)\r\n\r\n' reply: 'HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n' header: Content-Length: 792 header: Content-Type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8 Out[141]: [{u'Timestamp': datetime.datetime(2013, 2, 20, 17, 11), u'Unit': ''}, {u'Timestamp': datetime.datetime(2013, 2, 20, 17, 10), u'Unit': ''}, {u'Timestamp': datetime.datetime(2013, 2, 20, 17, 12), u'Unit': ''}, {u'Timestamp': datetime.datetime(2013, 2, 20, 19, 8), u'Unit': ''}, {u'Timestamp': datetime.datetime(2013, 2, 20, 19, 16), u'Unit': ''}, {u'Timestamp': datetime.datetime(2013, 2, 20, 19, 37), u'Unit': ''}, {u'Timestamp': datetime.datetime(2013, 2, 20, 11, 39), u'Unit': ''}] {code}
fields.summary: Requesting incorrect statistic name is allowed

comments.body: Using metric.query(period=60,start_time=start, end_time=end,statistics=['Maximum']) I get: {code} send: 'GET /services/CloudWatch/?AWSAccessKeyId=EAG1SHNVZ5EHEVQVSWS2G&Action=ListMetrics&Dimensions.member.1.Name=AutoScalingGroupName&Dimensions.member.1.Value=ASGroup&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2013-05-22T18%3A27%3A46Z&Version=2010-08-01&Signature=wlz9qHTJojVsEKLXdmn7WGiZfojWa5ldIwJRp5qbflE%3D HTTP/1.1\r\nHost: 10.111.5.22:8773\r\nAccept-Encoding: identity\r\nContent-Length: 0\r\nUser-Agent: Boto/2.5.2 (linux2)\r\n\r\n' reply: 'HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n' header: Content-Length: 1519 header: Content-Type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8 [{u'Maximum': 0.0, u'Timestamp': datetime.datetime(2013, 5, 22, 18, 12), u'Unit': u'Bytes'}, {u'Maximum': 0.0, u'Timestamp': datetime.datetime(2013, 5, 22, 18, 15), u'Unit': u'Bytes'}, {u'Maximum': 109772.06818621208, u'Timestamp': datetime.datetime(2013, 5, 22, 18, 17), u'Unit': u'Bytes'}, {u'Maximum': 0.0, u'Timestamp': datetime.datetime(2013, 5, 22, 18, 20), u'Unit': u'Bytes'}] {code} Using metric.query(period=60,start_time=start, end_time=end,statistics=['MAX']) I get: {code} send: 'GET /services/CloudWatch/?AWSAccessKeyId=EAG1SHNVZ5EHEVQVSWS2G&Action=ListMetrics&Dimensions.member.1.Name=AutoScalingGroupName&Dimensions.member.1.Value=ASGroup&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2013-05-22T18%3A29%3A12Z&Version=2010-08-01&Signature=1cBBspVWl5ICfXm1AksTPceiRefEw0zquKb7Pa4rHdM%3D HTTP/1.1\r\nHost: 10.111.5.22:8773\r\nAccept-Encoding: identity\r\nContent-Length: 0\r\nUser-Agent: Boto/2.5.2 (linux2)\r\n\r\n' reply: 'HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n' header: Content-Length: 1519 header: Content-Type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8 send: 'GET /services/CloudWatch/?AWSAccessKeyId=EAG1SHNVZ5EHEVQVSWS2G&Action=GetMetricStatistics&Dimensions.member.1.Name=InstanceId&Dimensions.member.1.Value=i-784141E7&EndTime=2013-05-22T18%3A29%3A12.667547&MetricName=DiskWriteBytes&Namespace=AWS%2FEC2&Period=60&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&StartTime=2013-05-22T18%3A14%3A12.667547&Statistics.member.1=MAX&Timestamp=2013-05-22T18%3A29%3A12Z&Version=2010-08-01&Signature=f9wnfePk4yB2P%2BdzmHo%2FXjyYY7PRzZAR1W4cjjhoP5M%3D HTTP/1.1\r\nHost: 10.111.5.22:8773\r\nAccept-Encoding: identity\r\nContent-Length: 0\r\nUser-Agent: Boto/2.5.2 (linux2)\r\n\r\n' reply: 'HTTP/1.1 400 InvalidParameterValue\r\n' header: Content-Length: 349 header: Content-Type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8 Traceback (most recent call last): File "/home/mmunn/MY_FILES/myScripts/python/cw-boto.py", line 160, in query2() File "/home/mmunn/MY_FILES/myScripts/python/cw-boto.py", line 103, in query2 stats_array = metric.query(period=60,start_time=start, end_time=end,statistics=['MAX']) File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/boto-2.5.2-py2.7.egg/boto/ec2/cloudwatch/metric.py", line 112, in query unit) File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/boto-2.5.2-py2.7.egg/boto/ec2/cloudwatch/__init__.py", line 250, in get_metric_statistics [('member', Datapoint)]) File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/boto-2.5.2-py2.7.egg/boto/connection.py", line 980, in get_list raise self.ResponseError(response.status, response.reason, body) boto.exception.BotoServerError: BotoServerError: 400 InvalidParameterValue SenderInvalidParameterValueThe parameter Statistics.member.1 must be a value in the set [Average, Sum, SampleCount, Maximum, Minimum].fa522fb7-7c3b-4206-a166-490fdfecff30 {code}
